turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good evening, Assistant. Yes, please I want to place some orders from this new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like from bella luna's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i heard chicken bbq, what other pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need two large pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i heard the chicken bbq order, what other pizza did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken barbecue with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, for the both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me order that, please note that extra cheese is an additional cost.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There's no problem with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is good. Please place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll pick it up myself. Give me the address.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pick-up or delivery?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it is located at 123 main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. I will check the amount immediately.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. You too.
